Title: Aerial Supremacy
Description:
The dragonflights have arrived. The skies are ours to reclaim! And you shall help us tip the scales.

Mount your drake and target the enemies above. You need only swoop in and take their forces by surprise. Your drake shall handle the rest.
ObjectivesText: Slay 15 enemy proto-drakes flying above the Field of Flames by striking them with your dragonriding mount.

Objectives.Text: Summon your Dragonriding Mount or mount Green Dragon
